attributes.action: Remove all speed humps from UK roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Speed humps create needless pain and suffering, particularly to people with certain medical conditions.In addition they delay emergency services, damage vehicles, create more noise and air pollution and have no proven impact on road casualty figures.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Remove all speed humps from UK roads."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12529.asp

Prime Minister's Office
